MS MCQs

    Configure exception and error handling in Power Automate Desktop

    »

    1. Which actions do they have exception handling options?

      Most of the actions

      Only critical actions that create instances and connections


    2. Which one of the following is an exception handling option in Power Automate Desktop?

      Email supervisor

      Set variable

      Stop flow run

      All of the above


    3. Which one of the following statements about exceptions is true?

      Exceptions are events that occur while a flow is running.

      Exceptions are events that occur while developing a flow.
